column5: So its bass and muskie opening weekened here(Quebec).Buddy and I have a bass tour in a couple of weeks so we decided to see what the lake looks like and see what the bass are doing. So for my first muskie of 2010 I catch a pretty looking  cracker on a topwater bass lure.After a few hours of bass fishing I tell my buddy I want a real muskie so we try one of our spots and not even 5 minute(probably 5 casts )I catch my first fifty of 2010. Also caught the action on my hatcam. Ask buddy if he wants to keep muskie fishing ,he says no lets go back to bass,as he will get his muskie later.
One hell of a brute on the first pic Larry A real nice way to start the season Thanks for sharing Leechman
Atta boy Larry, she's a real beaut and a great start to the year fer sure !!  Gotta tell ya though, you sure got some weird lookin skies out there in your part of the country
i was just thinking the same thing lew... whats up with that backround? great looking ski tho.
What a beauty Larry!!! Now socks in sandals... I can do with out that view! lol
I recognize that lake! I've seen that funny looking blue area on a lake in Quebec somewhere. lol
Very impressive musky. The other one looks like bait. Thanks for sharing.
